Text: FW Inactive account Greg Schockling Cc FYI Thanks Bert Stipelcovich Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell Original Message From ICE User Administration mailto Sent Monday April AM To Stipelcovich Bert Cc ICE User Administration Subject RE Inactive account Greg Schockling Importance High Bert Per your request the user account for Greg Schockling has been deactivated Thanks I n t e r c o n t i n e n t a l E x c h a n g e Lenora Slater Original Message From Stipelcovich Bert mailto Sent Monday April AM To ICE User Administration Cc Parks Joe Holtman Marcie Subject Inactive account Greg Schockling Please delete the inactive account of Greg Schockling effective immediately Thanks Bert Stipelcovich ICE Administrator Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell This email is the property of Bridgeline Holdings LP andor its relevant affiliates and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipients Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Bridgeline Holdings LP or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Monitor problempst Joe The Enron Resolution Center will send someone to take care of your monitor problem The problem was turned into Emory at the help desk earlier this morning Let me know if the problem is not resolved so that I can follow up Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

Gas Daily Monday June pst Gas Daily is unavailable again this morning from the Enron website at pubsgasdailyindexhtml I retrieved a copy directly from Platts and placed it on our file server at OBridgelineGas Dailygasdailypdf Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

FW Joe Parks Change status from Trader to Super User Cc Joe As requested your status has been changed from Trader to Super User which allows you to modify credit settings Thanks Bert Stipelcovich Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell Original Message From ICE User Administration mailto Sent Thursday April AM To Stipelcovich Bert Cc ICE User Administration Subject RE Joe Parks Change status from Trader to Super User Bert The below request has been completed Regards Kristi Tharpe IntercontinentalExchange Original Message From Stipelcovich Bert mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To ICE User Administration Cc Curry Randall Parks Joe Subject Joe Parks Change status from Trader to Super User Please change the status of Joe Parks from Trader to Super User Thanks Bert Stipelcovich ICE Administrator Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

Joe Parks Change status from Trader to Super User Cc Please change the status of Joe Parks from Trader to Super User Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice ICE Administrator Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

Inactive account Greg Schockling Cc Please delete the inactive account of Greg Schockling effective immediately Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice ICE Administrator Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

SCADA System Cutover Updatepst The cutover of the SCADA system and associated databases from St Rose to Hayes Road was completed last night According to ChevronTexaco the control system and databases are functioning properly However the direct connection to our pipeline data is not available this morning ChevronTexaco is investigating and I will provide an update when the problem is resolved Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

SCADA System Cutoverpst Later today the SCADA system and associated databases used to run our pipeline will be cut over from St Rose to Hayes Road The move should be largely transparent to us Energy and volumetric data for yesterday should be unaffected However as with any significant change there is a chance for unexpected problems We will be monitoring the cutover and working with ChevronTexaco to help ensure a smooth transition We will inform you if unexpected problems develop that affect pipeline control or data availability and integrity If you access the SCADA applications home page note that the address is changing from to Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

Bridgeline Distribution List for Emailpst A new distribution list has been created in the Global Address List for Bridgeline In fact it was used to send this email It is named DLBridgeline List and is available for selection from the Global List We requested the name Bridgeline but Enron email protocol require the present format for new distribution lists The list includes all Bridgeline personnel and will be kept current by Laura or myself Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

Applications support contact informationpst The attached Word document contains key contact information for applications support If I am available please route any problems through me Otherwise please contact the person listed in the document I can always be reached by cell phone at Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell

Gas Daily access instructionspst Gas Daily is unavailable this morning from its normal Enron website at pubsgasdailyindexhtml I retrieved a copy directly from Platts and placed a copy on our file server at OBridgelineGas Dailygasdailypdf A shortcut is attached below The current version of Gas Daily can be accessed online directly at UserFilesGDBAtodaypdf If prompted to log in use User Name ENET Password enron Thanks Bert Stipelcovichxmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Manager Information Systems Bridgeline Holdings LP Office Cell
